business-diagnostic.name: AI Business Diagnostic
business-diagnostic.tagline: Score your operations, marketing, sales, and finance in minutes.
business-diagnostic.description: Answer a guided intake, then get a full-stack AI report with scores, bottlenecks, and recommended next moves.

seo.title: Free AI Business Diagnostic Tool | TCTC
seo.description: Run a full AI-powered business health assessment covering operations, marketing, sales, finance, and team readiness.

faq.question: Is the AI Business Diagnostic really free?
faq.answer: Yes. Bring your own API keys and the tool will only use your provider credits. There is no charge from TCTC.

faq.question: What frameworks does the diagnostic analyze?
faq.answer: It evaluates five pillars: Operations, Marketing, Sales, Team, and Finance, with action items mapped to each pillar.

blog-builder.name: Local SEO Blog Builder
blog-builder.tagline: Generate 1-200 geo-targeted SEO posts in a single pass.
blog-builder.description: Batch content production with reusable prompts, keyword clusters, and city targeting. Export-ready Markdown and HTML.

seo.title: Free AI Blog Builder for Local SEO | TCTC
seo.description: Create dozens of geo-optimized blog posts with your own API keys. Perfect for agencies and local businesses.

faq.question: How many posts can I generate at once?
faq.answer: You can create from 1 to 200 posts per run with throttled batches to stay within provider rate limits.

faq.question: Do I need to store my prompts somewhere?
faq.answer: The builder saves prompt templates, outlines, and keyword lists locally in your browser so you can reuse them.

sales-simulator.name: AI Sales Simulator
sales-simulator.tagline: Role-play live discovery calls with AI prospects and objections.
sales-simulator.description: Customize persona, objections, and tone. Receive transcripts, objection breakdowns, and coaching notes.

seo.title: AI Sales Call Simulator | TCTC
seo.description: Practice discovery calls with adaptive AI buyers. Get instant transcripts, objection feedback, and coaching prompts.

faq.question: Can I upload my own scripts?
faq.answer: Yes. You can preload call frameworks, discovery questions, and custom objection libraries for the AI to use.

faq.question: Does it store call recordings?
faq.answer: No data leaves your browser. Transcripts are generated locally and can be exported by you only.

offer-architect.name: Offer Architect
offer-architect.tagline: Turn research into a packaged offer, value stack, and launch plan.
offer-architect.description: Map your audience, pains, deliverables, pricing, and proof into a polished pitch deck with GTM recommendations.
useCases: Prepping for cohort or group programs

seo.title: Offer Architect Tool | TCTC
seo.description: Generate a complete AI offer blueprint with positioning, value stack, pricing, and GTM plan using your own API keys.

faq.question: Does the Offer Architect store my research?
faq.answer: No. Everything lives in your browser. Inputs, history, and API keys stay in localStorage.

faq.question: Can I edit the blueprint after generating it?
faq.answer: Yes. You can rerun the intake with tweaks, load previous blueprints, and export Markdown or JSON for further editing.
